alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Collingsworth; Donley; Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Armstrong, south central Gray, west central Collingsworth and Donley Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Howardwick to near Hedley. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarendon, Howardwick, Hedley, Lelia Lake and Greenbelt Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
